name: Marvin AKERS, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Akers v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Marvin AKERS, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of April, 2009, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
969 A.2d 1179
Marvin AKERS, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.
No. 177 EM 2008.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 3, 2009.
